description.en: The AltaFin platform provide users with the saving contracts where interest paid from real estate assets. With a few clicks, a user can earn interest on his crypto-assets by loading up an AltaFin Earn saving contract. Also, users are able to level up their interest rates by holding AFN tokens in Crypto Wallets. Any holder can redeem interest on his saving contract every 7 days. As a result, the assets are instantly transferred to the corresponding Crypto Wallet.
